QAData.question: Who won between Watford and West Ham United on Tue, 28 Dec 2021 15:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: West Ham United won 4–1 over Watford on Tue, 28 Dec 2021 15:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Mark Noble completed the most passes (52) in the match.
Michail Antonio lost the most duels (12) in the match.
Craig Dawson has the least touches (34) of any outfield player.
Daniel Bachmann committed a foul leading to a penalty for West Ham United.
Manuel Lanzini is the most accurate passer (91%) in the match.
